text: int sum ( int ) ; int main ( ) { int t , n , arr [ 100000 ] = { } , i , j , count ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { count = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & arr [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { j = 1 ; while ( ( arr [ i ] <= arr [ i + 1 ] ) && ( i + 1 < n ) ) { i ++ ; j ++ ; } count += sum ( j ) ; } printf ( "%d\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; } int sum ( int n ) { int i , s = 0 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) s += i ; return s ; }
